error.signature: E: Failed to fetch http://archive.ubuntu.com/... 404 Not Found
error.regex: E: Failed to fetch|apt-get update.*failed|404.*Not Found.*archive

verdict.summary: apt package cache stale in Docker build. Common with cached layers.

dead_ends.why_fails: Mirrors change too; doesn't fix stale cache layer

workarounds.action: Always run apt-get update && apt-get install in same RUN layer
workarounds.how: RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y pkg && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

workarounds.action: Use specific base image tags, not :latest
workarounds.how:
# Use specific version tags:
FROM ubuntu:22.04  # Not FROM ubuntu:latest
FROM python:3.12-slim  # Not FROM python:latest
FROM node:20-alpine  # Not FROM node:latest

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'E' is a build_error error while 'COPY --from=builder failed' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
